title: LFT clash flexible d5 mid player
body:
Hi all,

Potentially keen on clash but don't have many similar ranked friends who are keen on for this weekend's event. Flexible player who can play for lane  (e.g. swain, irelia) or to put map pressure (galio, taliyah) and some 5s experience. Add in game if you're after a mid laner B) - IGN is MidbFlipperBeast
